name: Blazing Hatchet
effect: When a mob is hit, the axe generates an explosion and knocks back the mob - along with any nearby mobs - a large distance. The mob is also lit on fire.
When mining logs with the Blazing Hatchet, the logs will be "smelted" and turn into charcoal.
found: Dropped from a Pyro in the Forbidden Castle.
faq: Yes, it can be upgraded to netherite.
